 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדִיד‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==wide wrapper, or large veil== ([[BDB#Sept|ᵑ7]]<sup>**Jer**</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדִידָא‎</span> (especially for Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעִיף‎</span>); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> apparently ***veil***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***wrapper***); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדִידִי‎</span> [[Song.5.7|Song 5:7]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָרְדִידִים‎</span> [[Isa.3.23|Isa 3:23]] (in list of women's finery).
